alert.note: Alert for South Lincoln County; Upper Green River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 2:40PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Lincoln and northwestern Sweetwater Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 240 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fontenelle Reservoir, which is also 25 miles northeast of Kemmerer, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fontenelle Reservoir around 245 PM MDT. Fontenelle around 300 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: South Lincoln County; Upper Green River Basin
